title: Sans serif
author: VITAMINADO

comments.content: Similar to Core Rhino, but not quite.....

**Bienvenue** , created by Jean-Francois Porchez [Porchez Typofonderie] for the exclusive use of France Telecom:  
 [http://www.zecraft.com/fonts/bienvenue](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114804/http:/www.zecraft.com/fonts/bienvenue "http://www.zecraft.com/fonts/bienvenue")

According to the following note, is not available:

> Bienvenue is a proprietary typeface for France Télécom and will as such never be made available to the general public.
